title: Shawn Mendes looks rather windswept as he relaxes on a luxury yacht with his entourage in Perth
text:
He has been making the most of his time Down Under ahead of his Australian tour this month.

And Shawn Mendes was keen to take in Perth's local sights again on Sunday as he relaxed on a luxury yacht with his entourage.

Clad in a grey button-up shirt and green T-shirt, the 21-year-old heartthrob looked slightly windswept as he mingled on the deck with his male companions.

He's on a boat! Shawn Mendes, 21, relaxed on a luxury yacht with his entourage in Perth on Sunday

The Canadian hunk completed his ensemble with a button-up long sleeve shirt and a pair of dark sunglasses that shielded his famous visage from the elements.

At one stage, Shawn appeared to share a joke with a pal as they enjoyed the spectacular water views.

Later in the day, Shawn was spotted disembarking the luxury vessel and making his way to a parked van.

A day earlier, Shawn took to Instagram with three snaps of himself smiling alongside a quokka at Rottnest Island.

He captioned the adorable post, 'I met a Quokka !!!'

Shawn's girlfriend Camila Cabello showed her good sense of humour as she was quick to comment: 'I love this picture of us!'

Ahoy matey! Shawn has certainly been making the most of his time Down Under ahead of his Australian tour this month

Moving on! Later in the day, Shawn was spotted disembarking the luxury vessel and making his way to a parked van

Camila and Shawn met at Austin Mahone's 2014 Live On Tour concerts where the pair were both support acts for the American singer.

It comes as Shawn prepares for his Perth performance on October 23 at RAC Arena.

The crooner will perform a series of new hits from his self-titled LP, which debuted at number one on both the US Billboard 200 chart as well as number one on the ARIA Album Chart.
